name: settings()
description:
Configures the SPI interface

The default setting is: 500000, SPI.MSBFIRST, SPI.MODE0

parameters.name: maxSpeed
parameters.description:
maximum transmission rate in Hz, 500000 (500 kHz) is a
                  resonable default

parameters.name: dataOrder
parameters.description:
whether data is send with the first- or least-significant
                  bit first (SPI.MSBFIRST or SPI.LSBFIRST, the former is more
                  common)
